sentences: This issue was taken up in plenary on Thursday.
Chair Pachauri suggested, and the Panel agreed, to a continuation of the current Principles.

Australia requested the addition of a provision in the Principles for review editors for technical papers, noting that this role exists for assessment reports, special reports and methodologies, but not for technical papers, and asked that this concern be registered.
Chair Pachauri suggested that Australia formulate wording for a decision to modify the Principles, and to submit it for consideration at IPCC-29.
